about_the_game:
- STORY:

You have woken up amongst the corpses in the old deprecated and depraved temple - the air stench of rot and the once prosperous village turned into ruin while you have been unconscious.

You don't quite remember what brought you to these lands - nonetheless it is least important thing to worry about right now.

Facing with this strange and horrifying reality you must gather your last strength and escape the overwhelming darkness.

- CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTER

Choose one of three classes each with its own unique gameplay style and mechanics.

  • Lordsworn:

    - As the retainer of the crown, slash and bash your foes with pure brutal force or smite them with holy light.
    Take upon an knight oath and complete deeds to raise in power.
    Shine as beacon of hope for the righteous and innocent in this gods-forsaken land.

  • Sorceress:

    - As a highly qualified scholar and mage - transform your knowledge into a deadly weapon.
    Harness the power of the stars and elements and cast powerful spells capable of eradicating your foes.
    As the owner of the Grimoire learn its secrets becoming even more powerful or perish under the power of forces beyond your comprehension.

  • Warlock:

    - Sign a pact with evil forces. Offer your soul in exchange for forbidden knowledge and power.
    Cast dark and otherworldly spells or corrupt and destroy opponents via blood magic.
    However your ever demanding patron require your loyalty.
    Complete the quest that your patron gives you and grow in power as the these dark forces shares their power with you.

- EXPLORE DARK AND OMINOUS LAND

Explore the unknown and forgotten lands at the brink of collapse.
From the villages overrun by living corpses to a deep and gloomy forests.

Try to understand the plot of the world through environmental storytelling and convoluted places. Or don't and simply let the questions be unanswered.

Fight the blasphemous and unholy creatures or cover in fear before them.

Scavenge and plunder the ruins of the civilization - either for survival or lust for fortune.

Find and equip powerful items, learn deadly abilities and fight the dark forces of these lands.

- BRUTAL AND CONSEQUENTIAL EXPERIENCE

Engage in visceral, methodical and rhythmic combat. With unique and original Role-Playing systems - where your choices in your character progression will define your struggles.

Think carefully about decisions and actions you make - because every your decision is permanent and will last until the next playthrough.

Endure the brutal reality of Diabolika's world - where resources are scattered, no one can be trusted and death is permanent.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains instances of mature topics such as:
Blood, Violence, Genocide, War, Suicide, Nudity, Satanism and Occultism.

short_description: You have woke up amongst the corpses in defiled church - whole land turned to ruin - you must escape. Choose one of the three classes, learn new abilities, find powerful items and fight through hordes of enemies. Find you way out traveling through convoluted world - or perish while trying to.
